newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SingTel service extended to Saudi Arabia.
newsitem.headline: SingTel service extended to Saudi Arabia.

text.p: Singapore Telecom said on Thursday its PhoneHome Card service will be extended to Saudi Arabia from December 1 this year.

A company statement said callers using the facility no longer have to speak to an operator, pay hotel surcharges, or queue for a public telephone. Callers will have the option of charging to international calling cards or calling collect.
Other Singapore Telecom services such as SingaporeDirect, HomeEasy Dial, and Enhanced Call Home have been available in Saudi Arabia since September this year.
